```{r}
est=t1%>%group_by(intervention)%>%summarise(n=sum(count),success=sum(count*outcome))
n=75
p0=19/75
p1=30/75
se=function(n,p){
  se=sqrt(p*(1-p)/n)
  se
}
se0=se(n,p0)
se1=se(n,p1)
ci95=function(p,se){
  a=p-1.96*se
  b=p+1.96*se
  c(a,b)
}
```
